00025 #ifndef KICKWAVEFORM_H_
00026 #define KICKWAVEFORM_H_

00033 #include "WaveformInterface.h"
00034 #include "SVGGraph.h"

00039 struct KWStatusBitfield {
00041     unsigned int kickMode            :2;
00042 };
00043 
00044 enum KWKickMode {
00045     NoKick            = 0,
00046     KickSubstitutive  = 1,
00047     KickAdditive      = 2
00048 };
00049 
00050 
00052 struct KickWindow {
00054     int32                                usecLength;
00056     float                                amplitude;
00058     KWStatusBitfield                     status;
00060     GCRTemplate<WaveformInterface>       deltaTwaveform;
00061 };
00062 
00063 
00065 OBJECT_DLL(KickWaveform)
00066 class KickWaveform:  public WaveformInterface, public GCReferenceContainer, public HttpInterface {
00067 OBJECT_DLL_STUFF(KickWaveform)
00068 // Parameters
00069 private:
00071     int32                             numberOfWindows;
00073     KickWindow*                       waveform;
00075     int32                             rounding;
00077     int32                             windowStartUsecTime;
00079     SVGGraph                          svgGraph;
00080 
00081 //States
00082 private:
00084     int32                             currentWindowIndex;
00086     int32                             currentWindowRelativeUsecEndTime;
00088     int32                             lastResetUsecTime;
00089 
00090 
00091 // Private methods
00092 private:
00100     inline int32 FindCurrentWindowLength(int32 usecTime) {
00101         int32 nextLength = 0;
00102 
00103         // If a waveform is loaded use it
00104         if (waveform[currentWindowIndex].deltaTwaveform.IsValid()) {
00105             nextLength = (int32)(waveform[currentWindowIndex].deltaTwaveform->GetValue(lastResetUsecTime + usecTime - windowStartUsecTime) * 1E6);
00106             nextLength += rounding/2;
00107             nextLength /= rounding;
00108             nextLength *= rounding;
00109             return nextLength;
00110         } else {
00111             return waveform[currentWindowIndex].usecLength;
00112         }
00113     }
00114 
00120     inline void UpdateCurrentWindow(int32 relativeUsecTime) {
00121         // If we are at the last window AND the waveform is not made by only one
00122         // window return
00123         if ( (IsLastWindow()) && (numberOfWindows > 1) ) return;
00124 
00125         // Calculate relative usec time
00126         if (relativeUsecTime < 0) return;
00127 
00128         // If it's the first execution calculate relative length
00129         if (currentWindowRelativeUsecEndTime == -1) {
00130             currentWindowRelativeUsecEndTime = FindCurrentWindowLength(relativeUsecTime);
00131         }
00132 
00133         // If we reach the end of a window move to the next and update end time
00134         if ( (relativeUsecTime >= currentWindowRelativeUsecEndTime) && (!IsLastWindow()) ) {
00135             currentWindowIndex++;
00136             int32 nextLength = FindCurrentWindowLength(relativeUsecTime);
00137             currentWindowRelativeUsecEndTime += nextLength;
00138             waveform[currentWindowIndex].usecLength = nextLength;
00139         }
00140     }
00141 
00146     inline bool IsLastWindow() {
00147         return ( (currentWindowIndex+1) == numberOfWindows );
00148     }
00149 
00150 
00151 public:
00153     KickWaveform() {
00154         numberOfWindows                  = 0;
00155         waveform                         = NULL;
00156         currentWindowIndex               = 0;
00157         currentWindowRelativeUsecEndTime = -1;
00158         rounding                         = 0;
00159         windowStartUsecTime              = 0;
00160         lastResetUsecTime                = 0;
00161     }
00162 
00164     virtual ~KickWaveform() {
00165         if (waveform != NULL) delete[] waveform;
00166     }
00167 
00168 
00170     virtual void Reset() {
00171         currentWindowIndex               = 0;
00172         currentWindowRelativeUsecEndTime = -1;
00173         lastResetUsecTime                = 0;
00174     }
00175 
00181     virtual bool ObjectLoadSetup(ConfigurationDataBase &cdbData, StreamInterface * err);
00182 
00183 
00189     virtual bool ProcessHttpMessage(HttpStream &hStream);
00190 
00199     virtual float GetValue(int32 usecTime);
00200 
00205     virtual int32 GetKickMode() {
00206         return waveform[currentWindowIndex].status.kickMode;
00207     }
00208 
00216     virtual bool IsCompleted(int32 relativeUsecTime) {
00217         UpdateCurrentWindow(relativeUsecTime);
00218 
00219         if ( (IsLastWindow()) &&
00220              (relativeUsecTime > currentWindowRelativeUsecEndTime)) return True;
00221         return False;
00222     }
00223 
00224     virtual void SetWindowStart(int32 usecTime) {
00225         windowStartUsecTime = usecTime;
00226         int i;
00227         for (i=0; i<numberOfWindows; i++) {
00228             if(waveform[i].deltaTwaveform.IsValid()) {
00229                 waveform[i].deltaTwaveform->Reset();
00230             }
00231         }
00232     }
00233 
00234     inline void SetResetUsecTime(int32 usecTime) {
00235         lastResetUsecTime = usecTime;
00236     }
00237 
00238 };
00239 
00240 #endif /*KICKWAVEFORM_H_*/
